title: Zea (K)
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Robert Forget, Andre Leduc and Jean-Jacques Leduc
brief_description: A superb visual trick that will mystify its audience, this animated film transforms the commonplace into magic. The film presented a serious technical challenge because the subject was both elusive and explosive. A film to watch, enjoy and laugh about. (Awards: Cannes; Chicago; Elmhurst; Columbus; Paris; Genie, Toronto.) Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
